extends Object

      Create a JobStorage associated with the provided Job.

      • JobStorage

        public JobStorage(Job job,
                  File jobStorage,
                  String id)
        Create a JobStorage associated with the provided Job.
        Parameters:
        job - The job
        jobStorage - The job storage directory
        id - The job Id

      • JobStorage

        public JobStorage(Job job,
                  File jobStorage,
                  JobStorage otherJobContext,
                  String id)
        Create a JobStorage associated with the provided Job, and copy the context from another job.
        Parameters:
        job - The job
        jobStorage - The job storage directory
        otherJobContext - Copy context from this job storage
        id - The job Id

    • Method Detail

      • lazyLoad

        public void lazyLoad()
        Load the job. Will be triggered when the caller tries to read from a job.

      • save

        public void save()
        Save the job to the job storage. (i.e. stores the job XML) By default, will move the files instead of copying them.

      • save

        public void save(boolean moveFiles)
        Save the job to the job storage.
        Parameters:
        moveFiles - if set to false, will make copies of the context files instead of moving them.

      • listJobs

        public static List<String> listJobs(File jobStorage)
        List all job IDs that are stored in the given job storage folder.
        Parameters:
        jobStorage - the directory where jobs are stored
        Returns:
        a list of all the job IDs in the job storage

      • loadJob

        public static Job loadJob(String storageId,
                          File jobStorageDir)
        Load a job from the job storage folder.
        Parameters:
        storageId - The jobs Id in the storage
        jobStorageDir - The job storage directory
        Returns:
        The job

      • addContextFile

        public void addContextFile(File file,
                           String contextPath)
        Add the file to the context.
        Parameters:
        file - The file
        contextPath - the path to the file in the context

      • removeContextFile

        public void removeContextFile(String contextPath)
        Remove the file from the context. The file will also be removed from all attached arguments.
        Parameters:
        contextPath - the path to the file in the context

      • getContextFilePath

        public String getContextFilePath(File file)
        Get the file associated with the given context path.
        Parameters:
        file - the file
        Returns:
        the context path to the file as a string

      • getContextFile

        public File getContextFile(String contextPath)
        Get the path in context associated with the File.
        Parameters:
        contextPath - the path to the file in the context
        Returns:
        the file

      • getContextDir

        public File getContextDir()
        Returns the root directory for the context files.
        Returns:
        the root directory for the context files

      • makeContextZip

        public File makeContextZip()
        Bundles all context files up as a ZIP archive and returns it.
        Returns:
        the zip file

      • existsInContext

        public boolean existsInContext(String contextPath)
        Test whether the given path exists in the context. The path must be relative and can refer to either a file or a directory.
        Parameters:
        contextPath - the path to the file in the context
        Returns:
        true if the path exists as either a file or directory in the context.

      • isFileInContext

        public boolean isFileInContext(String contextPath)
        Test whether the given path exists as a file in the context.
        Parameters:
        contextPath - the path to the file in the context
        Returns:
        true if the path exists as a file in the context.

      • isDirectoryInContext

        public boolean isDirectoryInContext(String contextPath)
        Test whether the given path exists as a directory in the context.
        Parameters:
        contextPath - the path to the file in the context
        Returns:
        true if the path exists as a directory in the context.

      • delete

        public void delete()
        Deletes the job including all its files from the job storage.

        public String getStorageId()
